name: verse
desc: A lightweight tool for serving http built on top of the Deno standard library.

name: lifxhttp
desc: A thin wrapper around the Lifx HTTP protocol. Built in Deno.

name: esbuild_plugin_deno_http
desc: An esbuild plugin that uses Deno to resolve and cache HTTP modules

name: md2html
desc: A lightweight tool for creating github flavored HTML documents from markdown. Built using Deno.

name: esbuild_plugin_bundle
desc: An esbuild plugin that bundles modules before importing them
